text: I can help with that <@UMGLMQLA0>, I've built several similar calculators for reference :smile: - Thanks for the tag <@UJAPS2K4N>

Hi everyone,
does it happen to anyone else that the field "link" in modules  does not work with an anchor link?
No sir - never had an issue will pulling the link field aside from remembering that the syntax for it is `{{module.link.href.url}}`

I'm building a new custom blog post template via Hubl. 
 
Everything seems to be going well except for an issue with a specific module. When I apply the new template to the blog post, this module behaves as if no content was added to it.
 
The blog keeps the images and copy that was there with the prior template change but erases the content that was in this module. The module is also custom. 
 
If I switch back to the old template, the module shows that it has the content within it again. 

Any ideas?

Thanks for that <@UDC5GRX6E>! We've already got someone on for this one - but I do have additional projects involving significant JS/ HubDB and Hubl work. DM if you'd like me to send through briefs :slightly_smiling_face:
